7dd60fb56aa1.title: The Republicans have dug their own grave, but they won’t be lying in it for a few more years.

paragraphs.text: The Republicans have dug their own grave, but they won’t be lying in it for a few more years. They will almost certainly retain control of the Senate after the 2018 midterms — only eight Republican Senators are up for re-election next year, and six of those are from deep red states. But 2020 will be a different story.

paragraphs.text: “Although the 44 senators who supported the filibuster are a minority in the Senate, they represent well over half of the nation. Cry me a river, Milhiser.
